column5: i just ordered my licence via the phone (1 800 667 1940) and the agent said it'll take 5-6 weeks to arrive. take this into account if you want to get your license this way. phish

Did the agent say it would be 5-6 weeks because of the high demand?..I ordered mine in Feb and I believe they told me the same thing and I got it in 12 days..a couple of guys in our group ordered them late last month and got them in 10 days..lets see how long yours takes
a good point - maybe it's just the "company line" to say that it'll take 5-6 weeks. i'll post when i receive mine. it's not taken 5-6 weeks in the past - 2 weeks is more like it. phish
My fishing partner just called to order his...during the conversation the lady said 4-6 weeks...but the last thing she said was "this will go out in the mail in about 2 days"

i received my ontario license by mail today - 10 calendar days (6 working days) after i placed the order. the 5-6 weeks statement is much more of a CYA than a reality. it's never taken more than 2 weeks. phish
thats good to hear because a couple of guys in our group of 12 were a little tardy in ordering theres..
i agree with glenn man pretty fast about 12 and that was by mail ! ss
2 of our guys who ordered last Monday got them today
